verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them; This <S%H2088><s%> is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath commanded, <S%H6680><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

What man soever <S%H376><s%> <S%H376><s%> there be of the house <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that <S%H834><s%> killeth <S%H7819><s%> an ox, <S%H7794><s%> or <S%H176><s%> lamb, <S%H3775><s%> or <S%H176><s%> goat, <S%H5795><s%> in the camp, <S%H4264><s%> or <S%H176><s%> that <S%H834><s%> killeth <S%H7819><s%> it out of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the camp, <S%H4264><s%>

And bringeth <S%H935><s%> it not <S%H3808><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> to offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering <S%H7133><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be imputed <S%H2803><s%> unto that <S%H1931><s%> man; <S%H376><s%> he hath shed <S%H8210><s%> blood; <S%H1818><s%> and that <S%H1931><s%> man <S%H376><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> his people: <S%H5971><s%>

To the end <S%H4616><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> may bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> their sacrifices, <S%H2077><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> offer <S%H2076><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the open <S%H6440><s%> field, <S%H7704><s%> even that they may bring <S%H935><s%> them unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and offer <S%H2076><s%> them for peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings <S%H2077><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> <S%H853><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and burn <S%H6999><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And they shall no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> offer <S%H2076><s%> <S%H853><s%> their sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> unto devils, <S%H8163><s%> after <S%H310><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> have gone a whoring. <S%H2181><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> a statute <S%H2708><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> unto them throughout their generations. <S%H1755><s%>

And thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Whatsoever man <S%H376><s%> <S%H376><s%> there be of the house <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> or of <S%H4480><s%> the strangers <S%H1616><s%> which <S%H834><s%> sojourn <S%H1481><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you, that <S%H834><s%> offereth <S%H5927><s%> a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> or <S%H176><s%> sacrifice, <S%H2077><s%>

And bringeth <S%H935><s%> it not <S%H3808><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> to offer <S%H6213><s%> it unto the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> even that <S%H1931><s%> man <S%H376><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from among his people. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5971><s%>

And whatsoever man <S%H376><s%> <S%H376><s%> there be of the house <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> or of <S%H4480><s%> the strangers <S%H1616><s%> that sojourn <S%H1481><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you, that <S%H834><s%> eateth <S%H398><s%> any manner <S%H3605><s%> of blood; <S%H1818><s%> I will even set <S%H5414><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> against that soul <S%H5315><s%> that eateth <S%H398><s%> <S%H853><s%> blood, <S%H1818><s%> and will cut him off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H853><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> his people. <S%H5971><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the life <S%H5315><s%> of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> is in the blood: <S%H1818><s%> and I <S%H589><s%> have given <S%H5414><s%> it to you upon <S%H5921><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> your souls: <S%H5315><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is the blood <S%H1818><s%> that maketh an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for the soul. <S%H5315><s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I said <S%H559><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> No <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> blood, <S%H1818><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall any stranger <S%H1616><s%> that sojourneth <S%H1481><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you eat <S%H398><s%> blood. <S%H1818><s%>

And whatsoever man <S%H376><s%> <S%H376><s%> there be of the children <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> or of <S%H4480><s%> the strangers <S%H1616><s%> that sojourn <S%H1481><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you, which <S%H834><s%> hunteth <S%H6679><s%> and catcheth <S%H6718><s%> any beast <S%H2416><s%> or <S%H176><s%> fowl <S%H5775><s%> that <S%H834><s%> may be eaten; <S%H398><s%> he shall even pour out <S%H8210><s%> <S%H853><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof, and cover <S%H3680><s%> it with dust. <S%H6083><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> it is the life <S%H5315><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> flesh; <S%H1320><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of it is for the life <S%H5315><s%> thereof: therefore I said <S%H559><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of no manner <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> of flesh: <S%H1320><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the life <S%H5315><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> is the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof: whosoever <S%H3605><s%> eateth <S%H398><s%> it shall be cut off. <S%H3772><s%>

And every <S%H3605><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> that <S%H834><s%> eateth <S%H398><s%> that which died <S%H5038><s%> of itself, or that which was torn <S%H2966><s%> with beasts, whether it be one of your own country, <S%H249><s%> or a stranger, <S%H1616><s%> he shall both wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and bathe <S%H7364><s%> himself in water, <S%H4325><s%> and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the even: <S%H6153><s%> then shall he be clean. <S%H2891><s%>
But if <S%H518><s%> he wash <S%H3526><s%> them not, <S%H3808><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> bathe <S%H7364><s%> his flesh; <S%H1320><s%> then he shall bear <S%H5375><s%> his iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>
